LanguageData.AcceleratedGrowthEndAge_desc1: End age of accelerated growth\n Default: 18
LanguageData.BabyInheritPercentage_Desc: The probability of inheriting traits and skills. (not apply to CSL)
LanguageData.OptionChildrenDropWeaponsDesc: Children drop weapons when they fire to simulate their lack of recoil control and strength to hold the weapon.
LanguageData.GestationPeriodDays_Enable_Desc: Adjust the gestation period of all humanlike races in the game. Applies when the game is loaded. It doesn't work on Rim who are already pregnant.
LanguageData.GestationPeriodDays_desc: Adjust the gestation period of all humanlike races in the game. Applies when the game is loaded. It doesn't work on Rim who are already pregnant.
LanguageData.EnablePostPartum_desc: When enabled, female pawns will enter post partum after giving birth, preventing them from getting pregnant again for two quadrums. RJW Only
LanguageData.CryVolumeSetting_desc: Volume percent for the baby's crying audio clip. 0 to mute.
LanguageData.DebugInfoMessagesEnabled_Title: Enable graphic setting and debug logging
LanguageData.DebugInfoMessagesEnabled_desc: When enabled, will show graphic setting and will post frequent debugging logs to the console.
LanguageData.humanlikeHeadEnabled_desc: The face styles of the Ratkins and the Kurin look like human children.
LanguageData.RabbieChildHeadEnabled_desc: The face styles of the Rabbie look like human children.
LanguageData.HumanChildrenBodysize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.HumanChildrenHeadsize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.HumanChildrenHairsize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.HumanChildrenZroc_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.AlienChildrenBodysize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.AlienChildrenOriginalHeadsize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.AlienChildrenHumanlikeHeadsize_Title: Alien children human like head size
LanguageData.AlienChildrenHumanlikeHeadsize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.AlienChildrenHairsize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.AlienChildrenZroc_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.ShowHairSize_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.ShowHairLocY_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.ShowHairHumanZLoc_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.ShowHairAlienZLoc_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.ShowHairAlienHFLocZ_desc: It applies when you adjust the slide.
LanguageData.WakeThresholdPatchEnabled_desc: This option toggles babies/colonists wake up when a baby is unhappy/crying. This option is added because this feature may cause performance issues with too many babies/colonists. It is suggested that only disable if you experience high performance loss when colonists are sleeping.
LanguageData.FAModifier_Title: Facial Animation head size modifier (alien children)
LanguageData.FAModifier_desc: Use this setting to manually modify the best size for facial animation head
LanguageData.EnableChildrenSpawning_Title: Enable human children to be spawned
LanguageData.EnableChildrenSpawning_desc: RESTART REQUIRED.\nIf enabled you will see human children in raids, quests, empire reinforcements etc.\nRESTART REQUIRED.
LanguageData.EnableChildrenWatching_desc: If disabled, disables 'Watching' and disables 'Mentor' tab from pawn tabs.
LanguageData.ChildrenWatchingExpGainMultiplier_desc: Tweak the experience gain from watching.
LanguageData.SettingMinAgeTen_Title: Set min spawned children age to 10
LanguageData.SettingMinAgeTen_desc: Disable this if you want to see minimum 6 year olds in raids, quests etc. If enabled this makes spawned children min 10 years old. (Restart needed)
LanguageData.SettingChildRarity_desc: Enable this if you want children younger than teenagers (14yo) appear less often in raids, quests etc. (Restart needed)
LanguageData.TabWatch_desc: If the child has a mentor assigned they will prioritize watching the mentor
LanguageData.TabWatch_onlyMentor_desc: If enabled this child will only watch the mentor and ignore anyone else's work.
LanguageData.Locks2ToddlerConfig: Allow all colonists except toddlers and except
